scripts.build-push-timeend: pnpm run build-db && pnpm -F @proposalsapp/push-timeend run build
scripts.build-web: pnpm run build-db && pnpm -F @proposalsapp/web run build

scripts.build-astro: pnpm run build-db && pnpm -F @proposalsapp/astro run build
